= ngm_tool =

== 功能 ==

从语料库中提取出NGram

== 示例 ==

=== 提取Unigram ===
{{{
ngm_tool -N 1 -v  语料库 > unigram.txt
}}}

=== 提取Bigram ===
{{{
ngm_tool -N 1 -v  语料库 > unigram.txt
}}}

= lexicon =

== 功能 ==

辞典索引制作工具

== 示例 ==

=== 建立新索引 ===

{{{
lexicon -b -i lexicon.idx -s 辞典.txt
}}}

=== 显示索引里所有的辞 ===

{{{
lexicon_cli -d -i lexicon.idx
}}}

=== 查询索引 ===

{{{
lexicon_cli -q 单词 -i lexicon.idx
}}}

=== 显示索引统计信息 ===
{{{
lexicon_cli -n -i lexicon.idx
}}}
